name: df-inag
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(cinag, cmpt(s0, universe, copab(s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s2), co(cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), cmap, co(nat0, cfzo, nat3)))), wa(w3a(wne(cfv(cv(s2), nat0), cfv(cv(s2), nat1)), wne(cfv(cv(s2), nat2), cfv(cv(s2), nat1)), wne(cv(s1), cfv(cv(s2), nat1))), wrex(s3, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s3), co(cfv(cv(s2), nat0), cfv(citv, cv(s0)), cfv(cv(s2), nat2))), wo(wceq(cv(s3), cfv(cv(s2), nat1)), wbr(cv(s3), cfv(cfv(chlg, cv(s0)), cfv(cv(s2), nat1)), cv(s1))))))))))
comment: Definition of the geometrical "in angle" relation. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 15-Aug-2020.)
